headline: Goldman Coverage of Samsara’s Connected Operations Cloud Might Change The Case For Investing In Samsara (IOT)
summary: Earlier in February 2026, Goldman Sachs initiated coverage of Samsara, highlighting its Connected Operations Cloud that pairs edge hardware with a software platform to turn real‑world operational data into actionable insights for fleet and industrial customers. Analysts also underscored Samsara’s expanding AI video safety capabilities and regulatory-driven demand for digital logging and safety tracking, which are helping customers materially cut crash rates and insurance costs. We’ll now...
